name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior Sales Engineer with 8 years of robust experience in **Technical Solution Design**, **Project Management**, and **Specification Development** within the healthcare and financial sectors. With a strong emphasis on **Customer Relationship Management**, I excel in fostering collaboration and driving customer-oriented solutions.
Proficient in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, and experienced with **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, I leverage my full-stack development knowledge to deliver tailored technical presentations that translate complex technical concepts into customer-friendly solutions. My background in deploying solutions on **Azure** and **AWS** underpins my ability to provide high-performance applications while ensuring compliance with industry standards.
Excellent problem-solving skills combined with proficient communication in both **Fluent German** and **English** add value to my role as I engage with clients effectively. I take initiative and thrive in team environments, driven by a passion for continuous improvement and innovation.
